segments.text: Well , sir , we are asking all our guests to wear a jacket and a tie in our restaurant .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is that so ? I didn't know it.Can I possible borrow a jacket and a tie ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry you can't borrow a jacket and a tie .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then we return to the hotel and come back.Will you change the appointment ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly.What time will you come back ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right.We are waiting for you at seven .
segments.speaker: S1
